Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
      • org.jsfml.graphics.Shape
        • org.jsfml.graphics.RectangleShape
          • Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable, org.jsfml.graphics.Transformable
    public class Button
extends org.jsfml.graphics.RectangleShape
implements Clickable
    Creates a rectangle that acts like a button. Binding an EventHandler to a button allows it to perform an action when clicked

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.jsfml.graphics.Shape
